scripts.new-tag: cat package.json | jq -r '.version' | xargs git tag '{}' && git push origin --tags
scripts.bundle: npm run tag | tail -n 1 | xargs -I {} npx dir-archiver --src . --dest ./dist/$npm_package_name-{}.zip --exclude .DS_Store .git .gitattributes .github .gitignore README.md composer.lock node_modules vendor package-lock.json .github devel samples dist
